short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restrict access to websites by redirecting to Google.com to boost efficiency!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
💡 Boost Your Productivity by Restricting Distracting Websites!

DoctorRestrictor is your ultimate productivity tool that helps you stay focused by restricting access to distracting websites. Simply add websites to your restricted list, and DoctorRestrictor will redirect you to Google.com whenever you attempt to visit them.

Completely free and easy to use, DoctorRestrictor is designed with a clean, intuitive interface. It’s perfect for anyone looking to enhance their productivity and eliminate distractions in their daily routine.

Use Cases
🔒 Personal Productivity: Block social media, news sites, or any other distractions during work hours.
📚 Students: Restrict access to gaming or entertainment sites to stay focused on studies.
💼 Professionals: Enhance work efficiency by blocking distracting sites during office hours.
👨‍👩‍👧 Parents: Manage and control the websites your children can access.
👥 Teams: Ensure your team remains productive by restricting non-work-related websites.

Key Features
Easy to Add Websites: Simply type in the website URL you want to restrict, and it’s added to your list.
Efficient Redirection: Attempts to access restricted websites are automatically redirected to Google.com, keeping you on track.
Import/Export Functionality: Easily back up and share your list of restricted websites. Import lists from colleagues or use your previous configurations.
📥 Import: Upload a JSON file to add multiple restricted sites at once.
📤 Export: Download your list of restricted sites as a JSON file for backup or sharing.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and simple design that is easy to navigate.
🔐 Security Features: Prevents adding Google.com to the restricted list to ensure essential functionalities remain accessible.

Why DoctorRestrictor?
DoctorRestrictor helps you:
🎯 Stay Focused: By blocking distracting websites, you can concentrate better on your tasks.
📈 Increase Productivity: Less time wasted on distractions means more time for productive work.
⚙️ Maintain Control: Take charge of your browsing habits and create a more efficient workflow.
